markdown:
**Activate** command ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Effect** You sing, hum, or whistle a note, and your bow provides appropriate accompaniment. Make a Strike with the bow. If it hits, the bow generates a magical effect determined by the note you sung, which has the traits indicated in parentheses. This affects every creature in a 10-foot emanation from the creature you hit. As normal for an emanation, you choose whether the creature you hit is affected.
  • **Song of Soothing** ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) Each creature regains 3d10 Hit Points and gains a +1 status bonus to saves against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects for 1 minute.
  • **Song of Suffering** ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) Each creature takes 3d10 sonic damage with a DC 31 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save.
